column4: So, we did it yesterday, huh?
Oh no, I forgot to buy an After Pill! What now?
Ugh... Looks like I will have to accept that she might get pregnant.
I want you to take the pill.""
Huh? What are you talking about?
I want you to take a morning after pill, just in case.
Oi, oi, what's this about? Feeling high and mighty suddenly?
You're too much of a bigshot now to be my partner, huh? After all we did yesterday?
That's not, I just don't think we're…
No, I understand very well. Alright then. I'll take the pill. Who'd want to have your kids anyway? It would be worse than a nightmare.
I almost promoted you to my partner too, guess that was a mistake too.

column5: I want you to have the baby.""

column4: Oho, look who thinks he's all high and mighty now. Me? Have your kids?
You think a mere manservant like you deserves to become my partner? In your dreams.
Please, [H名]-san. I'll do anything, I'll become a better man, I'll surpass your expectations.
Those are some big words, you know? You sure you can do that?
Alright then, I'll hold you to that. Surpass yourself, surpass my expectations. Make me not regret having your children.
